title: Pillar (Hallowed Sepulchre)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Pillars can be found inside of the Hallowed Sepulchre. The player can use a Mith grapple and any crossbow to reach the other side and loot the coffin. Grappling the pillar will reward the player 50 to 80  Agility experience, depending on the floor, with experience given for crossing both ways. The pillar can be crossed again, but experience is only awarded for the first crossing and return. Failing to cross will cause the player to respawn at the original location after a time delay with the screen faded black. The pillar can still be crossed for experience after the timer has run out.

content:
This article is about the scenery object in Hallowed Sepulchre. For other uses, see Pillar.
Pillar
Released4 June 2020 (Update)
MembersYes
QuestSins of the Father
LocationHallowed Sepulchre
OptionsGrapple
ExamineSwing it.
Advanced data
Object ID38791, 38792, 38793, 38794

Pillars can be found inside of the Hallowed Sepulchre. The player can use a Mith grapple and any crossbow to reach the other side and loot the coffin. Grappling the pillar will reward the player 50 to 80 Agility experience, depending on the floor, with experience given for crossing both ways. The pillar can be crossed again, but experience is only awarded for the first crossing and return. Failing to cross will cause the player to respawn at the original location after a time delay with the screen faded black. The pillar can still be crossed for experience after the timer has run out.

When equipped, the Hallowed grapple will always succeed.

Agility info[edit | edit source]

Experience is only awarded on the first crossing and return.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
2 July 2020
(update)

The Agility XP gained from treasure encounters on Floor 5 of the Hallowed Sepulchre has been reduced from 100XP to 80XP.

24 June 2020
(update)

The XP rates for completing a treasure encounter have been adjusted. Floors 3 and 4 changed from 50 to 75, and floor 5 changed from 50 to 100.

|image = [[File:Pillar (Hallowed Sepulchre).png]]

'''Pillars''' can be found inside of the [[Hallowed Sepulchre]]. The player can use a [[Mith grapple]] and any crossbow to reach the other side and loot the [[Coffin (Hallowed Sepulchre)|coffin]]. Grappling the pillar will reward the player 50 to 80 {{SCP|Agility|link=yes}} experience, depending on the floor, with experience given for crossing both ways. The pillar can be crossed again, but experience is only awarded for the first crossing and return. Failing to cross will cause the player to respawn at the original location after a time delay with the screen faded black. The pillar can still be crossed for experience after the timer has run out.

When equipped, the [[Hallowed grapple]] will always succeed.

==Agility info==
Experience is only awarded on the first crossing and return.
